dcterms:description: The dataset provides foundational concepts and theories in automata theory, languages, and computation, which are crucial for understanding state-space representations in control theory.
dcterms:title: Automata Theory

dcterms:creator: T. Kailath
dcterms:description: This dataset covers the principles of linear systems, which are essential for understanding state-space realizations in control theory.
dcterms:title: Linear Systems

dcterms:creator: J. W. Polderman

dcterms:description: This dataset introduces mathematical systems theory from a behavioral perspective, relevant for understanding state-space representations.
dcterms:title: Mathematical System Theory

dcterms:creator: R. Bellman
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the principles of dynamic programming, which are foundational for optimization in control systems.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Programming

dcterms:creator: R. Bellman
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses adaptive control processes, providing insights into dynamic system control.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Control Processes

dcterms:creator: A.T. Fuller
dcterms:description: This dataset explores phase space in control theory, which is relevant for understanding state-space representations.
dcterms:title: Phase Space in Control Theory

dcterms:creator: J. P. La Salle
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the stability of dynamical systems, which is crucial for analyzing state-space representations.

dcterms:description: This dataset covers topics in mathematical system theory, providing insights into state-space representations.
dcterms:title: Topics in Mathematical System Theory

dcterms:creator: A. Nerode
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses linear automaton transformations, which are relevant for understanding state-space representations in automata theory.

dcterms:creator: A. V. Oppenheim

dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into discrete-time signal processing, which is relevant for control systems and state-space representations.

dcterms:creator: E. D. Sontag
dcterms:description: This dataset covers mathematical control theory, focusing on deterministic finite-dimensional systems, relevant for state-space representations.

dcterms:description: This dataset discusses supervisory control of discrete-event systems, which is relevant for understanding control systems.

dcterms:creator: E.I. Verriest
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a unified approach to state space realization, relevant for understanding state-space representations in control theory.

dcterms:description: This dataset introduces the modern theory of dynamical systems, which is essential for understanding state-space representations.
